title: Science E-Learning Pedagogy Development Process Based on the ICARE Learning Model

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific theories and research methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: e-Learning Pedagogy Development Process for Science Education Using PBL in a Smartphone-Centric, Resource-Limited Tech Environment

learning_goals: Cultivate the ability to design science-based e-learning content using the five stages of the ICARE model (Introduction-Connection-Application-Reflection-Extension).
Strengthen PBL project execution and collaborative learning competencies in smartphone-based environments.
Ensure e-learning content quality management through expert validation and learner evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
